title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 241 of 2025),
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Fees)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Fees) 

Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited company act 2014 (fees) regulation 2025

title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 241 of 2025),
heading: In these Regulations—
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations— 

“Act of 2014” means the Companies Act 2014 (No. 38 of 2014); 

“Council Regulation” means Council Regulation (EC) No. 2157/2011 of 8 
October 2001 on the Statute for a European company (SE); 

“electronic form” means in relation to the doing of any act specified in the 
second column to the table of fees set out in the Schedule the doing of that act 
by means of the electronic filing system in use by the Registrar; 

“paper form” means, in relation to a matter specified in the second column to the 
table of fees set out in the Schedule— 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

the filing of a document or an application in paper form, or 

the inspection of a document or an application submitted in paper 
form, or 

the submission of a document in paper form, or 

the provision of a certified or uncertified copy of a document by 
the Registrar. 

“qualifying partnership" has the meaning assigned to it by Regulation 5 of the 
Regulations of 2019; 

“Regulations of 2007” means the European Communities (European Public 
Limited Liability Company) Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 21 of 2007); 

“Regulations of 2019” means the European Union (Qualifying Partnerships: 
Accounting and Auditing) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 597 of 2019); 

“Societas Europaea” shall be construed in accordance with the Regulations of
text_norm: 2 regulations-- act 2014 mean company act 2014 (no 38 2014) council regulation mean council regulation (ec) no 2157 2011 8 october 2001 statute european company (se) electronic form mean relation act specified second column table fee set schedule act mean electronic filing system use registrar paper form mean relation matter specified second column table fee set schedule-- (a) (b) (c) (d) filing document application paper form inspection document application submitted paper form submission document paper form provision certified uncertified copy document registrar qualifying partnership meaning assigned regulation 5 regulation 2019 regulation 2007 mean european community (european public limited liability company) regulation 2007 (s.i no 21 2007) regulation 2019 mean european union (qualifying partnership accounting auditing) regulation 2019 (s.i no 597 2019) societas europaea shall construed accordance regulation

title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 241 of 2025),
heading: Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in
text_raw:
2007.

"Iris Oifigiúil" of 18th July, 2025.

title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 241 of 2025),
heading: 3. The fees to be paid to the Registrar are those set out in the third and fourth
text_raw:
3. The fees to be paid to the Registrar are those set out in the third and fourth 
columns of the Schedule to these Regulations opposite the mention of the matter 
specified in the second column of the Schedule.
text_norm: 3 fee paid registrar set third fourth column schedule regulation opposite mention matter specified second column schedule

title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 241 of 2025),
heading: 4. Where the Registrar directs pursuant to section 30(3)(b) of the Act of
text_raw:
4. Where the Registrar directs pursuant to section 30(3)(b) of the Act of 
2014 that a company change its name, any fee that would, but for this Regulation, 
be required to be paid in respect of the registration of that change shall not be 
charged, levied or paid.
text_norm: 4 registrar directs pursuant section 30(3)(b) act 2014 company change name fee would regulation required paid respect registration change shall charged levied paid

title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 241 of 2025),
heading: 5. The Companies Act 2014 (Fees) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 294 of 2023)
text_raw:
5. The Companies Act 2014 (Fees) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 294 of 2023) 

are revoked. 

 
 
 
 
 4 [329] 

Regulation 3

title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 241 of 2025),
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations set out the fees to be paid to the Registrar of Companies in 
respect of matters under the Companies Act 2014 and revoke the Companies 
Act 2014 (Fees) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 294 of 2023). 

 
 
 
 
 [329] 15
